name: Poly FM
description: A 4-operator FM polysynth algorithm based on the disting EX algorithm. Supports microtuning.

parameters.name: Operator N Amplitude
parameters.description: Amplitude of operator N.

parameters.name: Operator N Attack
parameters.description: Attack time for operator N's envelope.

parameters.name: Operator N Decay
parameters.description: Decay time for operator N's envelope.

parameters.name: Operator N Ratio
parameters.description: Frequency ratio for operator N relative to the base frequency.

parameters.name: Operator N Offset
parameters.description: Frequency offset for operator N.

parameters.name: Operator N Feedback
parameters.description: Feedback amount for operator N.

parameters.name: Modulation N->M
parameters.description: Modulation amount from operator N to operator M.

parameters.name: Algorithm
parameters.description: Selects the FM algorithm (routing of operators).

parameters.name: Vel->amp sens
parameters.description: Sensitivity of overall amplitude to velocity.

parameters.name: Vel->att sens
parameters.description: Sensitivity of envelope attack time to velocity.

parameters.name: Vel->dec sens
parameters.description: Sensitivity of envelope decay time to velocity.

parameters.name: Output bus
parameters.description: The main output bus.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Output mode (Add/Replace).

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Output gain.

parameters.name: I2C channel
parameters.description: The I2C channel to listen on (0=Off).

parameters.name: Left output
parameters.description: The left output bus.

parameters.name: Right output
parameters.description: The right output bus.

parameters.name: Global gain
parameters.description: A global gain adjustment applied to all timbres (in

parameters.name: Bank Chooses the voice bank. Voice
parameters.description: Chooses the voice within the bank.

parameters.name: Transpose
parameters.description: Coarse tuning control.

parameters.name: Fine tune
parameters.description: cents Fine tuning control.

parameters.name: Brightness
parameters.description: An overall scaling on the modulator depths.

parameters.description: Sets the output level.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel to listen on.

parameters.name: Bend range
parameters.description: The MIDI pitch bend range.
